csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id></id>
    <title></title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>

    <citation>
        <layout>
            <text value="hello"/>
        </layout>
    </citation>
    <bibliography>
        <layout>
            <group delimiter=" ">
                <group delimiter=", ">
                    <names variable="author">
                        <name/>
                    </names>
                    <text variable="title"/>
                </group>
                <date variable="issued" prefix="(" suffix=")">
                    <date-part name="year"/>
                </date>
            </group>
            <text variable="abstract" display="indent"/>
        </layout>
    </bibliography>
</style>

input.abstract: An interesting book by an interesting author.
input.title: Book A

input.abstract: An old contribution to a new field.
input.title: Book B

result:
John Smith, Book A (2000)
An interesting book by an interesting author.
Robert Jones, Book B (2001)
An old contribution to a new field.
